# IntelliChat ðŸ’¬

**Modern Email-Based OTP Authentication Chat Application**

> Real-time chat application with WebRTC video calling, status updates, and file sharing. Built with MERN Stack + Email-based OTP authentication using Nodemailer.

![Node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node.js-43853D?style=for-the-badge&logo=node-dot-js&logoColor=white)
![React](https://img.shields.io/badge/React-20232A?style=for-the-badge&logo=react&logoColor=61DAFB)
![Express](https://img.shields.io/badge/Express.js-000000?style=for-the-badge&logo=express&logoColor=white)
![MongoDB](https://img.shields.io/badge/MongoDB-4EA94B?style=for-the-badge&logo=mongodb&logoColor=white)

## ðŸš€ Quick Start (2 minutes)

### Prerequisites
- Node.js v14+
- MongoDB
- Gmail account

### Step 1: Backend Setup
```bash
cd backend
npm install
# Create .env file with:
# MONGO_URI=your-mongodb-uri
# EMAIL_USER=your-gmail@gmail.com
# EMAIL_PASS=your-app-password
# PORT=8000
# FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:3000
# JWT_SECRET=your-32-char-secret
npm run dev
```

# PORT=8000
# FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:3000
# JWT_SECRET=your-32-char-secret
npm run dev
```

### Step 2: Frontend Setup
```bash
cd frontend
npm install
npm start
```

### Step 3: Test Authentication
1. Open http://localhost:3000
2. Enter your email
3. Check your email for OTP code
4. Enter OTP and create profile
5. Welcome to IntelliChat! âœ…

## âœ¨ Key Features

### Authentication
- ðŸ” Email-based OTP (6-digit code)
- â±ï¸ 5-minute OTP expiry
- ðŸ‘¤ User profile creation
- ðŸ”‘ JWT token-based sessions

### Chat Features
- ðŸ’¬ Real-time messaging (Socket.IO)
- ðŸ‘¥ One-to-one & group chats
- ðŸ“Ž File & media sharing
- ðŸŸ¢ Online/offline status

### Advanced Features
- ðŸŽ¥ WebRTC peer-to-peer video calling
- ðŸ“± User status updates
- ðŸŽ¨ Dark/light theme
- ðŸ“± Responsive mobile design

## ðŸ”§ Technology Stack

### Backend
- **Node.js + Express** - Web server
- **MongoDB + Mongoose** - Database
- **Nodemailer** - Email OTP delivery
- **Socket.IO** - Real-time communication
- **JWT** - Authentication
- **Cloudinary** - Image hosting

### Frontend
- **React** - UI library
- **React Hook Form** - Forms
- **Framer Motion** - Animations
- **Tailwind CSS** - Styling
- **Axios** - API calls
- **Socket.IO Client** - Real-time updates
- **Zustand** - State management

## ðŸ”‘ Environment Setup

### Backend .env
```env
MONGO_URI=mongodb+srv://username:password@cluster.mongodb.net/intellichat
EMAIL_USER=your-gmail@gmail.com
EMAIL_PASS=your-app-specific-password
PORT=8000
FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:3000
JWT_SECRET=your-random-32-character-secret-key
CLOUDINARY_NAME=your-cloud-name
CLOUDINARY_API_KEY=your-api-key
CLOUDINARY_API_SECRET=your-api-secret
```

### Frontend .env
```env
REACT_APP_API_URL=http://localhost:8000/api
REACT_APP_ENV=development
```

**See COMPLETE_DOCUMENTATION.md for Gmail app password setup**

## ðŸ“š API Endpoints

### Authentication
```
POST /api/auth/send-otp          # Send OTP to email
POST /api/auth/verify-otp        # Verify OTP code
POST /api/auth/update-profile    # Create/update user profile
```

### Chat
```
GET  /api/chat/conversations     # Get all conversations
POST /api/chat/send-message      # Send message
GET  /api/chat/:conversationId   # Get messages in conversation
```

### Status
```
GET  /api/status/all             # Get all user statuses
POST /api/status/create          # Create new status
```

**Complete API docs in COMPLETE_DOCUMENTATION.md**

## ðŸ§ª Quick Test

### Test Send OTP
```bash
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/auth/send-otp \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email":"test@example.com"}'
```

### Test Verify OTP (with code from email)
```bash
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/auth/verify-otp \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"email":"test@example.com","otp":"123456"}'
```

**More tests in COMPLETE_DOCUMENTATION.md Testing Guide**

## ðŸ› Troubleshooting

### Email not sending?
- âœ… Check EMAIL_USER & EMAIL_PASS in .env
- âœ… Gmail app password generated correctly?
- âœ… Check spam/junk folder
- âœ… Wait 10-30 seconds (SMTP can be slow)

### OTP not validating?
- âœ… Ensure 6-digit code from email
- âœ… No spaces in OTP
- âœ… OTP valid for 5 minutes only

### Can't connect to MongoDB?
- âœ… Check MONGO_URI is correct
- âœ… Whitelist your IP in MongoDB Atlas
- âœ… Verify credentials are correct

eck MONGO_URI is correct
- âœ… Whitelist your IP in MongoDB Atlas
- âœ… Verify credentials are correct

### CORS errors?
- âœ… Add `credentials: 'include'` to fetch calls
- âœ… Check FRONTEND_URL in backend .env
- âœ… Clear browser cookies/cache

**Full troubleshooting in COMPLETE_DOCUMENTATION.md**

- Email-only login form

- Improved error handling
